sentences.en: But when she tried to caress him, the boy shunned her.
sentences.cn: 可是当她底手去抚摸他底时候, 他又躲闪开了.

sentences.en: But who will understand me and caress away my tears?
sentences.cn: 不过谁能了解我,抱我,抚慰我 呢 !

sentences.en: He prescribed his fiancee's reception of his caress.
sentences.cn: 他要求他的未婚妻接受他的拥抱.

sentences.en: His hands gently caressed her body.
sentences.cn: 他的双手温柔地抚摸着她的身体。

sentences.en: I caress you, let you taste us , just so blissful listen.
sentences.cn: 我爱抚着你, 让你品位这一切, 快乐的聆听.

sentences.en: If your skin is very hungry, let me caress you with love.
sentences.cn: 如果你有“肌肤饥渴症”, 就请让我爱抚你吧.

sentences.en: Margaret took me to one side, holding my arm in a gentle caress.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特将我拉到一边，轻轻地抚摸着我的胳膊。

sentences.en: Quietly caress your body, and every detail inside and India in mind.
sentences.cn: 静静的抚摸你的身体, 把每个细节都印在心里面.

sentences.en: She feasted on the caress of the hot spring.
sentences.cn: 她尽情享受着温泉的抚爱.

sentences.en: She gave the child a loving caress.
She kissed him perfunctorily on the forehead and he gave her hand a casual caress.
sentences.cn: 她在他的额头上随便吻了下,他也漫不经心地摸了一下她的手.

sentences.en: Slowly, droplets of you seep in through the night's soft the caress.
sentences.cn: 轻柔的, 你化作水滴渗入黑夜的爱抚.

sentences.en: So intensively and so deep as our fingers unite, our hands caress.
sentences.cn: 如此强烈如此深沉就像我的手握在一起, 互相拥抱.

sentences.en: That leaves but the caress of your voice whispered.
sentences.cn: 那树叶的摩挲声可是你暖暖耳语.

sentences.en: The lonely child is longing for the caress of his mother.
sentences.cn: 这个孤独的孩子渴望母亲的爱抚.

sentences.en: To study the effect of caress on defecation and jaundice of newborn.
sentences.cn: 探讨抚触对新生儿排便和黄疸的影响.

words.tran_cn: 爱抚的；亲切的；表现爱情的

trans.tran_en: a gentle touch or kiss that shows you love someone
to touch someone gently in a way that shows you love them

trans.tran_cn: 爱抚，抚摸，怜爱，宠爱，亲吻
trans.tran_en: to touch someone gently in a way that shows you love them
to touch someone gently in a way that shows you love them
